summary: Lost Prospect Mine made a full player home/hideout
descriptionHtml:
A simple mod that edits the Lost Prospect Mine east of Riften to make it a nice secluded player home or hideout. I have tried to minimize the impact on the feel of the mine and its lore so there is little in way of wall or map edits. 

Change log
-Added the missing Tanning rack outside them mine
-Added more storage be the bed
-Fixed a nav mesh error
-Fixed some of the clipping issues  

What it has
-Made it an \"no re-spawn\" zone  
-All the inactive barrels have been replaced with proper containers   
-All containers are non-respawning  
-Full crafting stations, All Blacksmith tools including a smelter, both alchemy and enchanting tables, and a cooking pot
-Some storage by the alchemy and enchanting tables

Know Bugs
-Some very minor clipping issues

Conflicts
-Possibility anything that mods Lost Prospect Mine and just outside it\'s doors 

Plans
-Fix more of the minor clipping issues
-More storage
-Maybe a hidden hatch to a lower level (if the inspiration takes me)

Install
place the \"Lost Prospect Mine Home.esp\" into your \"Program Files\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\" folder and use and mod-manger or the launchers \"Data files\" option and check the box

Update
Copy the new file to your data folder and click yes to override 

Remove
Un-check it\'s box and delete the \"Lost Prospect Mine Home.esp\"

This is the first mod I have uploaded, although I have done a few personal mods for myself before
author: Cyden
